TopicTitle: Vessel Untitled Space Craft was on-rails at 1.0 atm pressure and was destroyed.

Articles.Content:
since 0.90, I get a lot of these in the logs..

all in one game - just now..

*[LOG 16:41:01.078] Vessel FortressOfDoom was on-rails at 1.0 atm pressure and was destroyed.*

*[LOG 16:41:01.080] Vessel Untitled Space Craft was on-rails at 1.0 atm pressure and was destroyed.*

*[LOG 16:41:01.081] Vessel Frobal Kerman was on-rails at 1.0 atm pressure and was destroyed.*

does anyone know why?

To clarify - all of those three vessels where landed at KSC!! 0.0m/s and standing solid on the ground.

They got removed, when I changed to an other vessel - also landed..

Sometimes it sais in the logs "*Crashed through terrain*" with same result..

Also with landed ships..

That has killed about 60 of my kerbals so far..

Am I the only one or is that the new "normal"

The first two, are own blender constructions - one part vessels..

the 3rd is an EVA kerbal.

If I'm the only one, it must be something with my ships - if so, I'm in the wrong forum..

but until I'm certain, I'd appreciate any pointers..

Debris cleanup at KSC can be a bit glitchy sometimes. I actually lost two kerbals who I left on the tracking station area while I was switching around between kerbals and, I dunno, something happened and suddenly those two were missing.

well - I am glad it's not only me then :-)

But still - that is kind of a "let's put that on the <needs fix=""> list" thing IMO.</needs>

Thanks for the clarification..
